body_html:
@maxss280's method works for me! In fact I have written some path settings, but with wrong syntax (forgot to add keyword "export"). So, this step, checking if environment variables are valid, is very important.
A good reference to this: https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/117467/how-to-permanently-set-environmental-variables

BTW, when something must be redone for each time computer restarted, I think writing the command into .bashrc file may be a kind of solution.
